item.title: Create File
item.description: --- - hosts: localhost become: true tasks: - name: Create file file: path: /tmp/yallo state: touch Ref http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/file_module.html An alternative is to use ‘lineinfile’ module. In my example below, Ubuntu 18.x no longer has the /etc/rc.local but it still works. See below ## NOTE : /etc/rc.local doesn't exist in Ubuntu18.x but still runs if executable + has the shebang line ## See https://www.claudiokuenzler.com/blog/783/ubuntu-18.04-rc.local-file-not-exist-launch-with-systemd-rc-local#.XDYuL88zZTY - name: Create executable /etc/rc.local if it doesn't exist lineinfile: dest: /etc/rc.
